about_the_game:
Core Features:

「Zero Distraction Desktop Mode」

  • Instantly hide all icons/taskbars with one click, creating a distraction-free environment for creation/gaming/streaming.

  • Supports quick toggle via hotkey (default: Ctrl+Alt+1). Files remain intact but invisible.

「Rapid Launch Engine」

  • Drag and drop icons into the software interface to bind them to custom hotkeys (e.g., Ctrl+Alt+S to launch Steam).

  • Integrated with Everything for ultra-fast searches. Double-click to open any file directly.

「Privacy Shield」

  • Automatically hides sensitive content during streams/meetings to avoid awkward leaks.

  • No background data collection, 100% local operation.

「Dynamic Aesthetics Lab」

  • Freely change software skins and cursor styles.

  • Fully compatible with Wallpaper Engine dynamic wallpapers, creating a personalized visual system.

💡 Why Choose Us?

  • Focus Booster: A "digital zen room" for research/writing/coding users, eliminating distracting icons.

  • Essential for Streamers & Designers: Automatically hides private files during screen recording/streaming, achieving a professional image with one click.

  • Lightweight Tech Marvel: Only uses 15MB of memory, more resource-efficient than browser tabs.

  • Dual Safety Mechanism: All operations are reversible, offering both "Stable Mode" and "Minimalist Mode" startup options.

🚀 Advanced Tips (Scenario-based Guidance):

  • Gamers: Set Ctrl+Alt+G to instantly open the game library, automatically hiding the taskbar during full-screen gaming.

  • Efficiency Enthusiasts: Bind Ctrl+Alt+E to instantly open Everything search, 10x faster than Windows search.

  • Geek Play: Use virtual desktop features to create dedicated "Work/Play/Study" space stations.

New Feature 1: Customize adding programs, files, and folders to the right-click menu.

New Feature 2: Supports converting dynamic wallpapers to static wallpapers.

Note: The program might be mistakenly flagged or deleted by antivirus software, causing it to fail to open. Adding the program to the trust list can resolve this issue. The program is virus-free, please use it with confidence.
detailed_description:
Core Features:

「Zero Distraction Desktop Mode」

  • Instantly hide all icons/taskbars with one click, creating a distraction-free environment for creation/gaming/streaming.

  • Supports quick toggle via hotkey (default: Ctrl+Alt+1). Files remain intact but invisible.

「Rapid Launch Engine」

  • Drag and drop icons into the software interface to bind them to custom hotkeys (e.g., Ctrl+Alt+S to launch Steam).

  • Integrated with Everything for ultra-fast searches. Double-click to open any file directly.

「Privacy Shield」

  • Automatically hides sensitive content during streams/meetings to avoid awkward leaks.

  • No background data collection, 100% local operation.

「Dynamic Aesthetics Lab」

  • Freely change software skins and cursor styles.

  • Fully compatible with Wallpaper Engine dynamic wallpapers, creating a personalized visual system.

💡 Why Choose Us?

  • Focus Booster: A "digital zen room" for research/writing/coding users, eliminating distracting icons.

  • Essential for Streamers & Designers: Automatically hides private files during screen recording/streaming, achieving a professional image with one click.

  • Lightweight Tech Marvel: Only uses 15MB of memory, more resource-efficient than browser tabs.

  • Dual Safety Mechanism: All operations are reversible, offering both "Stable Mode" and "Minimalist Mode" startup options.

🚀 Advanced Tips (Scenario-based Guidance):

  • Gamers: Set Ctrl+Alt+G to instantly open the game library, automatically hiding the taskbar during full-screen gaming.

  • Efficiency Enthusiasts: Bind Ctrl+Alt+E to instantly open Everything search, 10x faster than Windows search.

  • Geek Play: Use virtual desktop features to create dedicated "Work/Play/Study" space stations.

New Feature 1: Customize adding programs, files, and folders to the right-click menu.

New Feature 2: Supports converting dynamic wallpapers to static wallpapers.

Note: The program might be mistakenly flagged or deleted by antivirus software, causing it to fail to open. Adding the program to the trust list can resolve this issue. The program is virus-free, please use it with confidence.
name: Blank Wallpaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7\8\10\11
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7\8\10\11
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Blank Wallpaper" — Minimalist Desktop × Productivity Boost Tired of a cluttered desktop? Instantly hide icons and taskbars for a clean, immersive workspace. Custom hotkeys, dynamic wallpapers, and privacy features included. Fully compatible with Wallpaper Engine—efficiency meets art.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
